title: Blood Pool
description: After her husband dies in a freak accident, Samantha Shelley inherits his boat yard and estates. Men from the Shelley blood pool have owned the land for two hundred years. This shocking break with tradition unleashes brutal emotions in the local community. Simmering dislike for her erupts into open hostility.Her problems intensify when an old friend, an eccentric inventor, goes missing in violent circumstances. She's devastated: he's been like a father to her while she grieved. The race is on to find him. The cops want him for murder. Government agents want him before he and his deadly, world-changing invention fall into the wrong hands.Sam discovers that she holds the key to his disappearance, a key that also makes her a target. To save them both she must reach him first. She follows his trail with the help of an unexpected ally, an ex-soldier living on a yacht in her harbor. Soon, she’s drawn into a murky world of espionage and death where no-one is what they seem, especially those nearest to her…
author: J.E. Ryder
